trans-unit.source: Add an expression to the display list; expressions in this list are evaluated at each step, and printed every time its value changes. WARNING: since these expressions are evaluated multiple times, make sure not to put expressions with side-effects in the display list.

trans-unit.source: As a general rule, every commit should come with its own test. If it’s a new feature, it should come with one or many tests which excercise it. If it’s a bug fix, the test should fail before the fix, and pass after.
trans-unit.target: As a general rule, every commit should come with its own test. If it’s a new feature, it should come with one or many tests which excercise it. If it’s a bug fix, the test should fail before the fix, and pass after.
